humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the tumor size as 2 x 0 x 2.2 cm. According to the rules, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. In this case, the largest tumor dimension is 2.2 cm, which falls within the T1 category. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size is 2 x 0 x 2.2 cm. According to the TNM staging system, T1 is up to 2 cm, T2 is between 2-5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.
